condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Les ecoles publiques des communes selectionnees dans les cinq departements cibles sont equipees pour faciliter l?apprentissage etla reussite des filles et des garcons dans les ecoles prescolaires et primaires.

description.narrative: After 4 years of promoting a package to ensure quality preschool education and school readiness as well as quality education in primary, especially in the early grades (1-4th grade) in the 106 schools, UNICEF confirmed that investing in the classroom with a comprehensive approach, children can learn and succeed. This is what the Haiti Wins program has demonstrated;with promising results in terms of improved reading competencies through teachers’ training, usage of reading materials in the children’s maternal language as well as the strengthening of supervision of schools by MoE and communities.; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/01/2022
